CustomField.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(CompletedDate__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(StartDate__c)) ), TEXT(FLOOR((CompletedDate__c - StartDate__c) * 24)) & ":" & LPAD(TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((CompletedDate__c - StartDate__c) * 1440, 60))), 2, "0") & ":" & LPAD(TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((CompletedDate__c - StartDate__c) * 86400, 60))), 2, "0"), "" )
CustomField.label: Execution Time
